definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
a notice to reassure the public/advance notice (of an agenda)

sentences.english: It seems most chinese people use a modified eMule that abuse servers.
sentences.chinese: 給在這個服務器的所有中國用戶的告示。

sentences.english: Keep checking the board to see if his flight has been delayed.
sentences.chinese: 持續查看告示板，看看他的班機是否耽擱了。

sentences.english: There another one of these boards on the other side of campus.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個告示板在校園的另一邊。

sentences.english: He said it angrily, pointing at the notice on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 他負氣地說着手指着牆上的告示。

sentences.english: Amendment to the above schedule is possible, please refer to notice board on-site for updated information.
sentences.chinese: 以上活動安排可能有變動，最新情況以現場告示爲準。

sentences.english: After putting on the new placard, the incidents of stealing books never happened again.
sentences.chinese: 新告示貼出後，圖書館再也沒有出現丟失書籍的現象。

sentences.english: CAREL reserves the right to modify the features of its products without prior notice.
sentences.chinese: 卡樂保留不預先告示即修改產品特性的權力。

sentences.english: I stuck a reminder on the bulletin board.
sentences.chinese: 我在告示牌上貼了一個提示語。

sentences.english: The AFCD replied that they have removed the mist net and posted notice on the site.
sentences.chinese: 漁護署回覆稱該部門昨天已移除霧網及貼出告示。

sentences.english: The Wuchang let the fortune teller to write with notices.
sentences.chinese: 那五常讓算命先生代寫應戰告示。

sentences.english: Xu said one employee found the note on the wall last Friday.
sentences.chinese: 徐良還說，上週五，一名員工在牆上發現了該告示。

sentences.english: Sign stickers are seen on each door to show which door to open.
sentences.chinese: 每一道門都有告示標貼以說明哪一道門會開。

sentences.english: I saw your Ad on the bulletin board yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天在告示板上看到你們的廣告。

sentences.english: The team had lots to do keeping me informed with the display boards.
sentences.chinese: 車隊爲了讓我從告示板上獲得信息做了很多工作。

sentences.english: It is so bad that the city posts signs to warn passerbys.
sentences.chinese: 情況已經非常嚴重，市政府已經張貼告示警告過路者。

sentences.english: Tip jars, according to Post, carry no obligation.
sentences.chinese: 小費罐，根據告示是沒有義務給的。

definition: posting on a bulletin board/notice/bulletin/to announce
a notice to reassure the public/advance notice (of an agenda)
announcement (written, on billboard, letter, newspaper or website)/to post information/a notice
to state in writing (laws, rules etc)
